item.title: Nuclear and Subnuclear physics
item.description:
Notes (in Italian) of the entire course of Nuclear and Subnuclear physics at the University of Trento. The course was held by prof. Giuseppina Orlandini during the spring semester of the a.y. 2019/2020.

This work is the result of a titanic effort made by me and Gabriele Libardi.

  • Nuclear and Subnuclear Physics Notes.

NB: These notes are only partially reviewed and could contain several typos along with conceptual errors, handle with care.

item.title: Miscellaneous Material
item.description: • Here the italian version of the Swinging Atwood’s machine work can be downloaded. For more information visit the Swinging Atwood’s machine project page.
